title: Destined Oracle
description: Synopsis: With evil corrupting even the ranks of angels, the oneto save the world doesn't know of what she is capable.At three years old, her Mother hid her in the humanworld from the realm of magic and from those whowished to thwart her destiny. After her last remainingrelative on her father's side passes away, her motherdecided to return her daughter to the magic worldwhere she belongs. With the forces of evil building anarmy, will Savina find the power and strength to dowhat she was born to do? Or will the forces of evilfinish what it began years before and destroy her?
author: J.G. Martinez
